TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PrintPageEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性检索表示边距之间页面部分的矩形区域。The property retrieves the rectangular area that represents the portion of the page between the margins. 属性检索表示页面总区域的矩形区域。The property retrieves the rectangular area that represents the total area of the page. 属性定义用于进行绘制的图形对象。The property defines the graphics object with which to do the painting. 属性检索当前页的打印机设置。The property retrieves the printer settings for the current page. 其余属性指示是否应取消打印作业，或者打印作业是否有更多页面。The remaining properties indicate whether a print job should be canceled or whether a print job has more pages. 有关 Windows 窗体打印的详细信息，请参阅 命名空间概述。For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the namespace overview. 如果要从 Windows Presentation Foundation 应用程序进行打印，请参阅 命名空间。If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下面的代码示例假定 `printButton` `pd` 已在上创建了一个名为的和名为的 。The following code example assumes a named `printButton` and a named `pd` have been created on a . 请确保 的事件与该 方法相关联 `printButton_Click` ，并且的事件与 示例中的方法相关联 `pd_PrintPage` 。Make sure the event for the is associated with the `printButton_Click` method and the event of the is associated with the `pd_PrintPage` method in the example. `printButton_Click`示例中的方法调用 引发事件的方法 ，并打印方法中指定的 .bmp 文件 `pd_PrintPage` 。The `printButton_Click` method from the example calls the method raising the event, and prints the .bmp file specified in the `pd_PrintPage` method. 若要运行此示例，请更改要打印的位图的路径。To run this example, change the path to the bitmap you want to print. 在 此示例中使用、 和 命名空间。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrintPageEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintPageEventArgs Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrintPageEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintPageEventArgs Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrintPageEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintPageEventArgs Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 大多数打印机无法在页面边缘上打印。Most printers cannot print at the very edge of the page.
